title: "Attempting To Reconnect" but doesn't show any ping/fps problems
body: I tend to disconnect a couple times each game which sometimes causes my death, but when I see the "Attempting to reconnect" message show up, my ping and fps show as if they are normal, even as I reconnect, it still doesn't show 500ms or 09fps, etc. Any way to solve this? I don't play with anything in the background other than the client, and making it disappear after the game starts doesn't seem to help.

replies.body: Your network may just be having some kind of hiccup with its connection to our servers, and that hiccup lasts long enough to actually d/c you. Check out your settings using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just to be safe, and make sure you pay extra attention to port forwarding and flushing your DNS.
